sect2.title: 内容
sect2.para: ucspi-tcp 包括 tcpserver, tcprules, tcprulescheck, argv0, fixcrio, recordio, rblsmtpd, tcpclient, who@, date@, finger@, http@, tcpcat, mconnect, addcr 和 delcr
你可以在 找到每个程序的详细介绍，这里只给出大致介绍：

sect3.title: tcpserver
sect3.para: tcpserver listens for incoming TCP connections on a given port, 和 runs a program of your choosing in response to a connection.

sect3.title: tcprules
sect3.para: tcprules compiles rules that govern access control for tcpserver into a fast access database format.

sect3.title: tcprulescheck
sect3.para: tcprulescheck makes it possible to see how tcpserver will react to connections from a given address without actually having to connect via that address. This is useful for checking to see if the access control rules you are using are doing what you expected.

sect3.title: argv0
sect3.para: argv0 runs a given program with a specified 0th argument.

sect3.title: fixcrio
sect3.para: fixcrio inserts carriage returns at the end of lines when they are missing.

sect3.title: recordio
sect3.para: recordio records all input 和 output of a program given as an argument.

sect3.title: rblsmtpd
sect3.para: rblsmtpd is a spam blocking program that works in conjunction with your SMTP daemon 和 tcpserver .

sect3.title: tcpclient
sect3.para: tcpclient creates a connection to a TCP port for a given program.

sect3.title: who@
sect3.para: who@ is a demonstration program using tcpclient that has the functionality of the rwho program. It requires a server running sysstat on port 11.

sect3.title: date@
sect3.para: date@ is a demonstration program using tcpclient that will return the system time of a remote host which is running a daytime service on port 13.

sect3.title: finger@
sect3.para: finger@ is a demonstration program using tcpclient that mimics the functionality of the finger program. It requires a server running fingerd on port 79.

sect3.title: http@
sect3.para: http@ downloads web pages from web servers.

sect3.title: tcpcat
sect3.para: tcpcat connects to a TCP port 和 prints all that is returned from the port.

sect3.title: mconnect
sect3.para: mconnect connects to a TCP port, delivers any input specified to the port, 和 prints any output from the port.

sect3.title: addcr
sect3.para: addcr adds carriage returns to files. This and delcr are useful for converting between Windows to Unix file formats.

sect3.title: delcr
sect3.para: delcr removes carriage returns from files.
